name: Advanced Base (TL 8)
description: Model 317 modular pressurized quarters for 6 persons, with air lock, recycler, fresher, atmosphere recirculating system, and console. The advanced base has a 6 ton displacement measuring 2 meters by 6 meters by 6 meters. It comes with 800 man-days' worth of food. Power is provided by PowerCells or generators. Advanced bases can be carried in the hold of starship.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Advanced Base (TL C)
description: Model 317 modular pressurized quarters for 6 persons, with air lock, recycler, fresher, atmosphere recirculating system, and console. The advanced base has a 6 ton displacement measuring 2 meters by 6 meters by 6 meters. It comes with 800 man-days' worth of food. Power is provided by an integral Fsuion+ unit for up to one year. Advanced bases can be carried in the hold of starship.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Airlock
description: A permanent metal structure for long-term use. Typically displaces 0.5 tons for human-sized sophonts.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Foam Shelter
description:
An advanced system base. The base of the system is a binary metapolyfoam that comes in a tank, massing 25 Kg. When dispensed the foam creates an insulated, pressurized structure displacing up to 10 tons. Each tank has enough of the foaming agents to create up to ten "1 ton structures" which can be dispensed individually, in groups or all at once. While the foam creates the basic structure, it does not create Life Support, merely shelter. It comes standard with an additional 1 ton package which is contained in membranes and framing which are used after unpacking for airlock doors. Other contents include an advanced Life Support system and a small laser cutter for fine shaping (it does Pen-1 dam- age if used in combat).

The system may be refilled at certified dealers for Cr 5500.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Hangar, Permanent
description: A permanent open structure made from standard construction materials that is designed to shelter aircraft (sometimes very large aircraft) with plenty of access space to perform maintenance.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Hangar, Temporary
description: A temporary open structure that is designed to shelter a single aircraft with minimal space to perform maintenance. Temporary hangars are typically 150 meters by 75 meters by 20 meters.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Airlock, Portable
description: An inflatable, portable chamber that can be attached to the vacuum side of a bulkhead, entered and pressurized, allowing a hole to be cut into a pressurized area without depressurization. It includes a patch held in place by pressure which seals the hole when the airlock is depressurized. The device includes a pressurized air cylinder and an automatic pump; the airlock is 500 cm x 20 cm x 200 cm deflated, and 1.5 m x 1.5 m x 2 m when inflated.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Prefabricated Shelter
description: Modular pressurized quarters for 6 persons. The 2 meter by 6 meter by 6 meter structure displaces 4 tons and can be carried in the hold of a starship.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Pressure Tent
description: Basic sheter for two persons, providing a standard atmosphere. There is no airlock so the tent must be pressurized or depressurized to enter or leave.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Tarpaulin
description: A canvas or waterproof cloth sheet used for temporary shelter. Tarpaulins are typically 2 meters by 4 meters in size.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Tent, (Personal)
description: Basic shelter for two persons.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Tent, (Vehicle)
description: Basic shelter for one vehicle.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Undersea Habitat
description: The undersea habitat contains support structures for undersea operations. The habitat is modular, allowing several units to be joined together to form a larger habitat, and includes a moon pool, a 20-ton vehicle maintenance bay, and 100 extra tons for living space, lab space, etc. The habitat has a 120 ton displacement.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
